events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Case assigned to the Refund cluster based on customer's request for a refund due to wrong item received.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let me assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that I can process your refund?
My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing that I received the wrong product.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prompt refund process and your help resolving this issue.
Your refund has been processed successfully. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you again for your assistance and excellent support.
We are closing the case now. Thanks for contacting us, and have a great day!
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our support today.
